channel.title: Shreyas Paul
channel.description: Thoughts and insights on product design

item.title: Getting Started in Webflow: A Beginner's Guide · Shreyas Paul
item.description: Webflow is a website builder that allows you to create professional-looking websites without knowing how to code. In this beginner's guide, we'll take you through the basics of getting started with Webflow, from creating a new project to previewing and publishing your website.

item.title: How to Optimize Your Webflow Website for Search Engines · Shreyas Paul
item.description: This blog provides a beginner's guide to optimizing a Webflow website for search engines. It covers keyword research, on-page optimization, technical optimization, and link building strategies. By following these tips, you can improve your website's search engine performance and attract organic traffic to your site.
